title: Identify element from successive IE - large IE4

content.question: Which of the following statements correctly identifies the element and cites the evidence supporting the identification?

choices.label: <math alttext="N a" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Na</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because of the large difference between the first and the second ionization energies
<math alttext="A l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because of the large difference between the third and fourth ionization energies
<math alttext="S i" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Si</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the fifth ionization energy has the greatest value

<math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because a neutral atom of <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has five valence electrons

content.answer: <math alttext="A l" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Al</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because of the large difference between the third and fourth ionization energies
